name: PixBeat
description:
Description:

A simple rhythm game where you are a grey bar that must catch all notes (the boxes)

soundtracks available here!

Controls:

Up & Down Arrow Keys to move

Press ESC key to exit from a menu or a song

Credits:

Creator/Owner, Programmer, Artist, Musician: Pedro FP

also check my twitter here for news about me or my games

Also, you can make mods and share here on itch.io with the tag "pixbeat-mod"

Check the source code here!

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FAST AND FLASHING LIGHTS!!!
